review: Dr. Satbir Singh has been an amazing doctor.He helped us recovering from Covid19 and guided us with the right path to over come this disease mentally and physically. Even during odd hours He responded everytime we contacted him.Thank you so much Dr. Satbir Singh.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: *** ****** ***** ** *********** * **** ******* He not only listens to your history patiently but also is very calm and reassuring with his advice and treatment. He didn‚Äôt try to hurry us up in anyway. He was able to explain the problem and gave enough time to explain about previous prescription given by a different doctor. Thank you Dr. Singh.
reply_text: Thanks for appreciation. We will try to keep up to your expectations in future too.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: My wife had a cardiomyopathy during delivery.we visited doctor after video consultation.Doctor prescribed few medicine.***** ****** ******** ** **** ******** ***** ****** *************** ********* *** ******** ** ***** **** * ***** ******** ***************** ** **** ***** ******** *** ****** ** *** ******* ***** ** *******May be other have good experience but we really didn‚Äôt had.
reply_text:
Dear Sir, Conditions like Cardiomyopathy can have varied response with similar dosages of medications in different patients. Dizziness is a common symptom in cardiomyopathy due to orthostasis. Any symtom which occurs following medications is not always due to medicines itself , it could be due to illness itself. Cardiomyopathy is a condition which requires continous care, vigilance and follow up. 
We wish all the best to your wife for best of health.
Regards.

tags: None
review: The location was incorrect .made me wait for an hour . And after an hour doctor did not seem to be interested . Staff was not good at all .doctor asked me to send some reports to him and when i send them the report then they said that you have to take another appointment to discuss these reports .pathetic services .really very bad **** **** *** **** **** ************
reply_text:
Doctors have to work on triage principles.... No doctor can justify to discuss reports of relatively stable patient who come to discuss report after more than a week of advice and delay consult of a patient with ongoing chest pain and shortness of breath. Your waiting time was due to your unplanned visit at clinic and still we consulted you without any charges as you requested that you are a student and can't afford consultation fees
 
Consultation charges are to be repeated after 7 days as per standard practo guidelines.
Map tagging is ok as per practo.
Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First of all I would like to say that he is more than a doctor . He is a good human being always with smiling face. I appreciate the way he treats his patients. He is someone who won't give you medicine unless it is necessary. He will listen to your queries and assure proper solution. You will feel relax after talking to him. I recommend for cardiac issues visit once and I am sure that after meeting to him you will definitely endorse me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

We were really stressed and my mother is a difficult patient to treat.He always answers the calls and help. He is such a nice professional doctor .

review: ** ****** ** ** ********* ************* *** *** **** ****** *** ***** *** **** On top of it, he is a great human being. His demeanor, tone and tanner is absolutely remarkable. tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are not satisfied with the doctor .he wrote lots of tests and want to admit the patient in his hospital.*** ******* ** ** ****** ********* *
reply_text:
1. Patient visited for cardiac consultation, cardiac ablation is not an OPD procedure.
2.No tests were recommended 
   a. In view of chest pain and ECG changes   (which was done outside one day ago)  
   b. Patient is having past history of angioplasty
   c. His heart pumping was compromised LVEF 30 -35 % (Echo done outside)
 3.I recommended admission in view of above assessment and not even advised repeat ECG or Echo as it was recently. I have clearly written plan of angiography as it was a plan after further assessment only.
